macro_themes.title: Battery Metals Enter Structural Supply Crunch
macro_themes.summary: Global electrification targets are accelerating faster than new mine approvals. Chronic permitting delays and capital discipline are creating tightening supply conditions across lithium, graphite, and rare earths.

macro_themes.title: Energy Security Reshaping LNG Trade Flows
macro_themes.summary: Long-term LNG contracts are replacing spot exposure as nations prioritize supply security. Infrastructure expansion and geopolitically aligned trade agreements are redefining global gas markets.

macro_themes.title: Capital Discipline Driving Mining Re-Rating
macro_themes.summary: After a decade of value destruction, major miners are prioritizing balance sheet strength and shareholder returns. Reduced capex growth is supporting commodity price floors and higher equity multiples.

macro_themes.title: Infrastructure Rebuild Supporting Industrial Metals
macro_themes.summary: Large-scale grid modernization and data center expansion are intensifying demand for copper and aluminum. Aging Western infrastructure combined with AI-driven energy consumption is reinforcing long-term metal deficits.
